Description: Restrictions on what authenticated users are allowed to do are not properly enforced.
PotentialImpact: Unauthorized access to sensitive data or actions.
Mitigations: Implement role-based access control (RBAC),Perform regular access control audits,Use the principle of least privilege

Description: Sensitive data is not adequately protected with encryption.
PotentialImpact: Data theft or exposure of sensitive information (e.g., passwords, personal data).
Mitigations: Encrypt all sensitive data both at rest and in transit,Use strong encryption algorithms,Implement proper key management

Description: Untrusted data is sent to an interpreter as part of a command or query.
PotentialImpact: Data leakage, corruption, or even total system compromise.
Mitigations: Use parameterized queries,Use input validation,Sanitize all user inputs

Description: Security weaknesses due to design flaws in software or system architecture.
PotentialImpact: Exposure to attacks and vulnerabilities due to improper security design.
Mitigations: Adopt a secure development lifecycle,Implement threat modeling during design,Use security-focused design principles

Description: Improperly configured security controls can expose systems to attack.
PotentialImpact: Exploitation of default configurations or unnecessary features.
Mitigations: Harden server and application configurations,Disable unnecessary features or services,Regularly review security configurations

Description: Using components with known vulnerabilities in software or infrastructure.
PotentialImpact: Application compromise or exploitation due to unpatched software or outdated libraries.
Mitigations: Use software composition analysis tools,Keep dependencies and libraries up to date,Patch known vulnerabilities promptly

Description: Failures in managing user identities, authentication, or session management.
PotentialImpact: Attackers gaining unauthorized access to accounts or systems.
Mitigations: Use multi-factor authentication,Ensure secure password storage,Invalidate session tokens after logout

Description: Insecure software updates, critical data corruption, or unauthorized changes to critical systems.
PotentialImpact: Application compromise or unauthorized system changes.
Mitigations: Digitally sign and verify software updates,Use integrity checks on critical data,Implement CI/CD pipelines with security controls

Description: Inadequate logging or monitoring can lead to undetected security incidents.
PotentialImpact: Delayed or missed detection of malicious activity.
Mitigations: Implement centralized logging,Ensure all critical events are logged,Monitor logs for suspicious activities

Description: The server can be tricked into accessing unintended resources.
PotentialImpact: Access to internal systems or sensitive data.
Mitigations: Sanitize and validate all inputs,Disable unnecessary URL fetch capabilities,Use network segmentation to limit internal access
